channel.title: [Class suggestion] Blue Beard
channel.description:
Alignment: Neutral Type: Killing Additional Information: A blue beard in real life is essentially the male version of a black widow. Goal: Kill all who would oppose you.
**(name WIP)** (passive) Immune to death at night until your second marriage **Court** (day, infinite use) begin courting target player **Marry** (Night, infinite use) Marry target player (you must be already courting them) **Poison** (night, infinite uses) Kill ALL players you are courting/married to. If you are married to them, your attack bypasses night immunity. If the attack fails, you remain courting them/being married to them.
There is no limit to the number of courtiers/brides you can have at a time.
Special thanks to bob, bob fixed the role. [quote="Bob, post:8, topic:2120"] MAKE COURTING A DAY ACTION!!! [/quote]

item.title: [Class suggestion] Blue Beard
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
for a neutral killer I have 2 major problems

  1. It’s an incredibly slow killer, compare it to the Possessor and Reaper who can kill 1 player EVERY night, this takes 2-3 nights to kill a single player
  2. Neutral Killers should not win with other Neutral Killers
    also an overall problem
    You cannot have more than 2 night abilities
